short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly annotate websites and pdf documents & share them with others.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With our powerful tool, you can effortlessly annotate websites and PDF documents with ease. Whether you're doing research, collaborating with colleagues, or just browsing the web, our app makes it easy to mark up important information in a snap.

With just a few clicks, you can take screenshots of any webpage or PDF and add your own notes, comments, or highlights. But that's not all - our app also lets you chat with an AI-powered assistant, ChatGPT, who can help you paraphrase or explain any difficult-to-understand text in plain language.

But the best part? You can easily share your annotated documents with others, allowing for seamless collaboration and teamwork. And the best part is, our app is completely free to use! So why wait? Start annotating and sharing your thoughts today with our powerful app.
